title: Need a Rioter comment ♡
body:
May I get any kind of reward or prize for drawing LoL Champions? I am really good at drawing and I have drew Azir and Blitzcrank until now. I would be so happy recieving any kind of reward for pictures I draw (Fan Art). Thanks for taking your time to read my post and have a nice day.
PS: I can send pictures of the Art next post :)

replies.body: Our community loves art, and I encourage you to share your love for league champs on the [Art boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art).  We don't really give rewards for things like this.  Sometimes, when a player needs a very small amount of RP to unlock something we may ask for some art and help them out with that.  Hope that helps clear things up!
Thanks for your respond ♡ Will make sure to send my art very soon!
